mapper.select: SELECT iii.`name`, iii.id insInfoId, iii.amount, irp.id, irp.is_oper_prod isOperProd, CONCAT(iii.img,',',iii.img1,',',iii.img2,',',iii.img3,',',iii.img4) concatSrc FROM ibs_report_price irp LEFT JOIN ibs_insurance_info iii ON irp.ins_info_id = iii.id WHERE irp.ins_id = #{insId} AND irp.member_id = #{memberId}
